description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and roles in innovation and user-centered design, Yeehaa is a leader in creating impactful solutions. Authored articles on digital ecosystem architecture and internet fragmentation, and curated a course on strategic planning for startups.
blurb: Yeehaa's work spans transformative design and innovation, with expertise in cognitive science. Authored notable articles on internet fragmentation and curated courses on strategic startup planning.
